about_the_game:
Akitoshi decided to take a vacation on Earth to rest and recover from the drudge of office life. Everything was perfect... Until a sudden storm sank the ship he was on! Now he's been washed ashore on a random island in the middle of who knows where, attacked by a wild animal, and saved by a mysterious young woman. What will happen to him now?

Get to know your savior, investigate the island... Do whatever you have to in order to survive and escape this tropical nightmare in this island exploration adventure RPG!

Investigate the Island

There's a secret hidden here, and you'll need to leave no stone unturned in order to uncover it... perhaps learning more about the enigmatic Mayalala in the process.

Hand-Drawn Art

Enjoy a wide array of expertly drawn character art as you take in the gorgeous island scenery. With sights like these, maybe this can still be a vacation to remember!

Different Endings to Uncover

There's no shortage of dangers on the island... Can you brave them and live long enough to find your way back to your home planet?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: An isolated island full of dangerous animals, a mysterious young woman... Just what has Akitoshi gotten himself into?
